mapper.select: SELECT sessionId, userId, consultantId, inquiryType, status, priorityScore, createdAt, updatedAt, waitStartTime, chatStartTime, chatEndTime FROM ChatSession WHERE sessionId = #{sessionId}
mapper.update: UPDATE ChatSession SET userId = #{userId}, consultantId = #{consultantId}, inquiryType = #{inquiryType}, status = #{status}, priorityScore = #{priorityScore}, waitStartTime = #{waitStartTime}, chatStartTime = #{chatStartTime}, chatEndTime = #{chatEndTime}, updatedAt = #{updatedAt} WHERE sessionId = #{sessionId}
mapper.select: SELECT sessionId, userId, consultantId, inquiryType, status, priorityScore, createdAt, updatedAt, waitStartTime, chatStartTime, chatEndTime FROM ChatSession WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY createdAt ASC

SELECT sessionId, userId, consultantId, inquiryType, status, priorityScore, createdAt, updatedAt, waitStartTime, chatStartTime, chatEndTime FROM ChatSession WHERE status = #{status} AND consultantId = #{consultantId} ORDER BY createdAt ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE ChatSession SET consultantId = #{consultantId}, status = #{status}, chatStartTime = SYSDATE, updatedAt = SYSDATE WHERE sessionId = #{sessionId}
UPDATE ChatSession SET status = #{status}, chatEndTime = SYSDATE, updatedAt = SYSDATE WHERE sessionId = #{sessionId}
mapper.select: SELECT cs.*, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ChatMessage cm WHERE cm.sessionId = cs.sessionId AND cm.senderId != #{consultantId} AND cm.isRead = 0 ) AS unreadCount FROM ChatSession cs WHERE cs.status = 'CHATTING' AND cs.consultantId = #{consultantId} ORDER BY cs.chatStartTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE ChatSession SET status = 'CANCELLED', updatedAt = SYSDATE WHERE status = 'WAITING' AND updatedAt < (SYSDATE - (#{minutes, jdbcType=INTEGER} / (24*60)))
UPDATE ChatSession SET status = 'CLOSED', updatedAt = SYSDATE WHERE status = 'CHATTING' AND updatedAt < (SYSDATE - (#{minutes, jdbcType=INTEGER} / (24*60)))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ChatSession WHERE status IN ('CLOSED', 'CANCELLED') AND updatedAt < (SYSDATE - #{days, jdbcType=INTEGER})
